name: Box and Bounce (for DATT 4300)
description:
Group members: Yalin Yang, Xinze Li, Yanyu Li, James Le (Hieu Le). 

This is a project for DATT 4300 2nd game project.  The game has one mechanics based on the verb "Hug".
